title: Can't Login
body: At the login screen. I type username and password. It always said "Unable to connect to the login cheque. Check server status here. If it looks good , follow the guide here" . I try the Hectech Repair Tool but it wont help anything. Please help me on this issue.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having some trouble reaching the login servers.  Try out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to configure your connection and get back in.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I did use Hextech Repair Tool but it doesn't work . Do you have any suggestion ?
Same.  Seen a ton of people connecting/disconnecting from games today.  Maybe Riot should check their servers.
I'm having the same issue and the "connection issues" page doesn't load for me =(
